title: Grilled Zucchini and White Bean Salad
directions: The trick to this dish is to cook it on charcoal embers after you’ve already cooked a couple of other dishes. Toss the zucchini with 3 tablespoons of olive oil, salt, and pepper and place on the embers. Cook until charred but still slightly raw, about 2 to 3 minutes.
Transfer to a cutting board and cut into 1-inch pieces, the transfer to a large bowl with the remaining ingredients. Toss well to combine and season with salt and pepper.
ingredients: kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste
2 tablespoons apple cider or sherry vinegar
2 (14-ounce) cans cannellini beans, drained and rinsed
3 shallots, sliced very very fucking thinly
a handful each basil, mint, parsley, and oregano, roughly chopped
